subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods was once so nearsighted that he said he would be considered legally blind without glasses or contacts. He had Lasik surgery in October 1999 after the Ryder Cup, won the Disney Classic in his first tournament back and went on to dominate golf.
